sentences.sentence: "Take him inside," he said sternly to his companions.
sentences.translation: “把他带进去。”他坚决地对他的同伴们说。

sentences.sentence: "This must never happen again," said the lady sternly.
sentences.translation: “这种事绝对不能再发生了。”小姐严厉地说。

sentences.sentence: "You stay here, while we take the rubbish away," said the lady sternly.
sentences.translation: “你留在这里，我们把垃圾带走。”罗特麦耶小姐严厉地说。
